project.description: Launching of a CloVR 16s pipeline with chimera checking using local credentials. This test uses a single fasta file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh vp-add-dataset -o --tag-name=clovr_16S_chimera_input_local_${DATE} /opt/hudson/16S_data/AMP_Lung.small.fasta vp-add-dataset -o --tag-name=clovr_16S_chimera_mapping /opt/hudson/16S_data/IGS.qmap
DATE=`date +"%m-%d-%Y-%T" | sed -e 's/:/_/g'`
vp-describe-protocols --config-from-protocol=clovr_16S \ -c input.FASTA_TAG=clovr_16S_chimera_input_local_${DATE} \ -c input.MAPPING_TAG=clovr_16S_chimera_mapping \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_NAME='local' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_CREDENTIAL='local' \ -c cluster.TERMINATE_ONFINISH=false \ -c pipeline.PIPELINE_DESC="Hudson CloVR 16S Chimera Test local ${DATE}" \ > /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE}
TASK_NAME=`vp-run-pipeline --print-task-name --pipeline-config /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE} --overwrite`
if [ "$?" == "1" ]; then echo "vp-run-pipeline failed to run" exit 1 fi
vp-describe-task --name local --exit-code --block $TASK_NAME
exit $?
